column1: #text=Last week me and my family wanted to ride the bus to the zoo .
#text=We checked the bus timetable and headed to the bus stop .
#text=We waited for about 10 minutes and then the bus arrived .
#text=We got on the bus and asked the bus man how much a family day ticket would cost .
#text=My mam paid him for the ticket .
#text=We went and sat at the back of the bus .
#text=Me and my siblings sat by the window so we could see when we were close to the zoo .
#text=We talked about what animals we wanted to see at the zoo .
#text=My favorite animals at the zoo are the monkeys .
#text=When we saw the zoo sign out the window we pushed the stop button and walked towards the exit doors .
#text=We thanked the bus driver and exited the bus .
#text=The zoo was right in front of us and we were all excited .
#text=We had a great day at the zoo .
